name: A Chilling Wind
flavourText:
<size:26>{All things slow under winter's 
onslaught - even life itself.}

name: A Dab of Ink
flavourText: The Poet's blood is the Empire's ink.

name: A Dusty Memory
flavourText: <size:29>{In the oldest halls of my mind, at the end of a rarely used passage, lies my greatest treasure: one moment of happiness and innocence, pure and untouchable.}

name: A Familiar Call
flavourText:
<size:29>{The mighty huntress always called for her chare,
But what we shared was a Lifelong Bond.}

name: A Fate Worse Than Death
flavourText: "It was as though my very thoughts were breaking... fracturing into tiny motes to be lost on the wind."

name: A Modest Request
flavourText:
<size:25>{Cede all power and wealth to me and serve me in perpetuity.
A minor inconvenience I assure you.}

name: A Mother's Parting Gift
flavourText:
Nature was her domain,
Love was her song,
Family was her devotion,
Knowledge was her gift.

name: A Note in the Wind
flavourText:
<size:30>{The artist is long dead,
the lyrics are long forgotten,
yet the Song of War longs to be sung again}

name: A Sea of Blue
flavourText: The harvest ended, the floods began.

name: A Stone Perfected
flavourText: <size:28>{They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.}

name: Abandoned Wealth
flavourText: When the world burned, the greedy burned with it, while the clever left as paupers.

name: Acclimatisation
flavourText:
The world is ever-changing.
Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands,
Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters.
Adapt or perish.

name: Akil's Prophecy
flavourText:
<size:28>{The hatungo know many answers to the same question, 
for time itself is a tangled web.}

name: Alivia's Grace
flavourText: Her innocence and grace were enough to tame even the wildest of beasts.

name: Alluring Bounty
flavourText:
<size:28>{A treasure worth killing for 
is a treasure worth dying for.}

name: Alone in the Darkness
flavourText:
"Sometimes, the most beautiful treasures...are the ones you cannot have." 
- Beryl, Survivor from the Azurite Mines

name: Altered Perception
flavourText: You mustn't forget: you won't be leaving this place.

name: Ambitious Obsession
flavourText: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but no vision.

name: Anarchy's Price
flavourText: Born of relentless Fury and abhorrence, warped by turmail and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.

name: Arrogance of the Vaal
flavourText: Discovery can lead to beauty, or it can lead to ruin.

name: Assassin's Favour
flavourText:
By the time their eyes meet, 
the dark deal has long since been made, 
and his fate long since sealed.

name: Assassin's Gift
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText:
<size:32>{What matters are
the Marks of your life,
not its Longevity.}

name: Astral Protection
flavourText:
For a time, we had something stronger than eldritch evil.
We had each other.

name: Atziri's Arsenal
flavourText: In the prison of all sins, will you grasp godhood or sorrow? Only hope lies under the shadows.

name: Audacity
flavourText:
<size:27>{A jolt, and it moves. Or smolders.
A current, and it lives. Or dies.
A surge, and it transcends.
Or... not.
Only one way to find out.}

name: Auspicious Ambitions
flavourText:
<size:30>{"Gaze upon the mirrors of what may come and step backward into infinity." 
- Dexion, Thaumetic Aspirant}

name: Avian Pursuit
flavourText:
Blazing through the night
Longing for infinite flight
Awaiting dawn's first light

name: Azure Rage
flavourText:
<size:28>{The mask hides his identity
but also makes it hard to read...}

name: Azyran's Reward
flavourText:
Method transcends shape and size. Do something in parallel long enough, and you will always find 
another way.

name: Baited Expectations
flavourText: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

name: Beauty Through Death
flavourText:
Her beauty did not fade 
her humanity did not survive.

name: Bijoux
flavourText: "Such fine trinkets show their true value in times of crisis." - Tangmazu

name: Blind Venture
flavourText:
"It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own."
- Klayver, the Antiquarian

name: Boon of Justice
flavourText: Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

name: Boon of the First Ones
flavourText:
<size:28>{Wreathed in the skin and bones
of the beasts she slew, 
her gift came from what she lost: 
her humanity.}

name: Bound by Flame
flavourText:
<size:30>{In battle we burn together
or not at all.}

name: Boundless Realms
flavourText: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

name: Bowyer's Dream
flavourText: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

name: Broken Promises
flavourText: Experience teaches us that the cold is not the same as the absence of warmth.

name: Broken Truce
flavourText: With a single act, years of peace have been shattered. An unknown assassin brings war upon us all.

name: Brother's Gift
flavourText:
Even though his flame has burned out, 
He will never fade away.

name: Brother's Stash
flavourText:
Even though he found the stash just in time,
He would trade it all away and then some to have him back.

name: Brotherhood in Exile
flavourText:
<size:25>{Seeking shelter from the night,
in the warmth of the run-down inn,
erstwhile foes put aside the fight,
to bond over whiskey and gin.}

name: Brush, Paint and Palette
flavourText: "Man may shape the world, but these? These shape the man." -Inquisitor Maligaro

name: Buried Treasure
flavourText: <size:28>{You can't seek riches without getting your hands dirty.}

name: Burning Blood
flavourText:
<size:28>{There's a ülace where up is down,
where right is wrong,
where pleasure is agony,
and where the living wish only for death.}

name: Call to the First Ones
flavourText: The Ezomyte, desperate for aid, cried out to the gods.

name: Cameria's Cut
flavourText:
"There are two ways to pay, Gold and Blood. I'll take my share in both."

-Cameria the Coldblooded

name: Cartographer's Delight
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText:
<size:28>{A map is similar
to a pair of eyes,
without one you stumble
around, unable to find your way.}

name: Chaotic Disposition
flavourText: Life isn't what you make of it, it's already been made for you.

name: Chasing Risk
flavourText: A fond memory fills me with nostalgia; some men would have felt guilt, but I felt no regret over the anguish and fear my ambitions caused.

name: Checkmate
flavourText: When victory is impossible, each of us plays only to delay the end.

name: Choking Guilt
flavourText: As death approached, clarity eluded him. The pain he had wrought surrounded him, dragging him into darkness.

name: Costly Curio
flavourText: "Oh no, I couldn't possibly afford this fine artefact. I'm... just looking."

name: Council of Cats
flavourText:
<size:30>{A King Loved By All,
A Shadow Awaiting Nightfall,
A Speaker Howling Away,
A Hunter Seeking Prey}

name: Coveted Possession
flavourText: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

name: Cursed Words
flavourText: If you look hard enough for hidden meaning, you will find it.

name: Damnation
flavourText:
Blood and death lead
the way to hell.

name: Dark Dreams
flavourText: No one ever truly understood what she meant when she said she wanted to raise a family.

name: Dark Temptation
additionalDropRestrictions: Can also drop from hidden chests in The Azurite Mine.
flavourText:
"Only a fool looks to the occult for power and expects to be spared from its wrath." 
- Voll, Emperor of Purity

name: Darker Half
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops when receiving Currency rewards from Delirium layers in maps (from Delirium Mirror or Delirium Orbs) and in Simulacrum.
flavourText: When you find what you're looking for, it's never quite right. When you have what you desire, yet you still want more.

name: Deadly Joy
flavourText:
<size:27>{"Be fast. That is all that matters."
- Rita of the Asylum}

name: Death
flavourText:
<size:31>{The end of the old,
the beginning of the new.
A unique opportunity for transformation,
for those with the power
to grasp it.}

name: Deathly Designs
flavourText: "The Karui was correct; there is virtue in honouring my ancestors."

name: Dementophobia
flavourText:
<size:28>{I never truly understood the depths of my insanity,
until I realized the voices beckoning me towards the abyss,
were none other than my own.}

name: Demigod's Wager
flavourText: Sometimes you need to make your own luck.

name: Desecrated Virtue
flavourText:
<size:25>{Awoken virtuous slivers of the void,
defiled by the avaricious, 
seized by the tyrannical.}

name: Desperate Crusade
flavourText: Through despondent hardships, those strong of spirit shall claim the prize.

name: Destined to Crumble
flavourText:
<size:30>{"Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us:
Nothing is eternal."
- Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar}

name: Dialla's Subjugation
flavourText:
<size:28>{A symbol of beauty and innocence
The gems corrupted her mind
Malachai corrupted her gems
All but a glimmer of
greatness lost in madness}

name: Disdain
flavourText: <size:28>{No man sees all, but you'll see more than some see in a lifetime.}

name: Divine Beauty
flavourText:
<size:30>{In a land far away lived 
a maiden most fair.
Her smile melted the coldest
of hearts, her song made
men and beast cry, 
her beauty unparalleled;
Divine.}

name: Divine Justice
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from an Armourer's Strongbox.[confirmation needed]
flavourText: Many sought the Goddess' blessing. Few survived the Labyrinth to receive it.

name: Doedre's Madness
flavourText: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

name: Doryani's Epiphany
flavourText: "Virtue gems have facets beyond those that can be seen by the mortal eye. Let us look deeper..."

name: Draped in Dreams
flavourText:
The suit I wear,
Is heavy and bare.
A canvas, it seems, breathing life into dreams.

name: Duality
flavourText: Good and Evil can be woven together to become something greater than either.

name: Dying Anguish
flavourText: <size:29>{Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.}

name: Dying Light
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Maven's Invitation: The FearedMaven's Invitation: The FearedModifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards droppedThe Maven must Witness:Cortex,Eye of the Storm,Moment of Reverence,The Shaper's Realm,Absence of Value and MeaningFor those who must not endure it,there may be found a perverse joy in watching the struggle for survival.Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device..
flavourText: Even the brightest eventually fade to darkness.

name: Earth Drinker
flavourText: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

name: Echoes of Love
flavourText: "I gave up my body for you. I gave up my name for you. And one day I shall give up my life for you."

name: Eldritch Perfection
flavourText:
Embrace horror.
Bathe in its beauty.

name: Emperor of Purity
flavourText:
True to his title,
Voll, newly crowned,
had many of the
Eternal Empire's signature
extravagances destroyed.

name: Emperor's Luck
flavourText: The house always wins.

name: Endless Night
additionalDropRestrictions: Can be found commonly from Leo's Trapped Stashes in Research; may require Rank 4 (Mastermind safehouse).
flavourText: The sun shines not for me. I walk in darkness, never free. Time stopped when you both died in my arms.

name: Etched in Blood
flavourText: When you strive to write your name on the dense pages of History, someone else, inevitably, must be crossed out.

name: Eternal Bonds
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from Map Reward Chests in Heist Contracts and Blueprints
flavourText:
Separate, stories untold.
Together, memories unfold.

name: Ever-Changing
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops in maps opened via Kirac missions.
flavourText: The Atlas is our prison, and our only defence. She is our only hope, and our certain doom.

name: Fateful Meeting
flavourText:
Some people act as beacons, illuminating the path for others. I was lucky to meet one such person.

- Anton to Zhenya.

name: Father's Love
flavourText: Everything is not enough.

name: Fire Of Unknown Origin
flavourText:
<size:26>{Faith sparks the flame,
a frenzy on the wind;
a fervour that drives us wildly onward.}

name: Forbidden Power
flavourText: Some things should not be used. Some power is too great a risk.

name: Friendship
flavourText:
<size:30>{"Set your life on fire. 
Seek those who
fan your flames"

-Rumi of the Vaal}

name: From Bone to Ashes
flavourText: For centuries, they stood vigil in secret over their sleeping goddess, even as contamination oozed out of the decadent Vaal empire.

name: Further Invention
flavourText: Why not both?

name: Gemcutter's Mercy
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from Gem chests in the Azurite Mine.
flavourText:
When you can only have one, which shall it be?
Red?
Blue?
Probably Green.

name: Gemcutter's Promise
flavourText: <size:29>{"I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter}

name: Gift of Asenath
flavourText: The Golden Sekhema's words could solve many a feud. Just what form that solution took was another matter.

name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
flavourText:
Our Lady Dialla,
as a symbol of our progress,
shines greater than all the gems.

name: Glimmer of Hope
flavourText: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

name: Grave Knowledge
flavourText: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

name: Guardian's Challenge
additionalDropRestrictions: Sold by Kirac for 3x Cartographer's ChiselCartographer's ChiselStack Size: 20Improves the quality of a mapRight click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower tier, non-unique maps. The maximum quality is 20%..
flavourText: To accept a challenge from the void is merely suicide for the unprepared.

name: Harmony of Souls
flavourText:
<size:29>{Shrieking souls locked away 
Hate splits frozen cells asunder 
The knot of corruption
undone at last}

name: Haunting Shadows
flavourText:
In the dead of night you may elude your shadows,
but they will always find you by dawn.

name: Her Mask
flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

name: Heterochromia
flavourText:
<size:26>{Black and White, Silver and Gold
Let us see the world Unfold
Red and Blue, Yellow and Green
Let us remake it in colours Unseen}

name: History
flavourText:
The future is oft-foretold
in records of the past.

name: Home
flavourText: There are countless people, countless stories, and countless eras, but there is one place that, for a time, each of us loved and was loved. It matters. We matter.

name: Hope
flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

name: House of Mirrors
flavourText: What do you see in the mirror?

name: Hubris
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Jeweller's Strongboxes.
flavourText:
"This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand."
- Jonfé Darontos, Ringmaker

name: Hunter's Resolve
flavourText:
Primed, curved and sleek.
Decisive and final.
For malice and righteousness.
There's but one solution.

name: Hunter's Reward
flavourText: To tame a beast, you first must subdue its heart.

name: I See Brothers
flavourText:
<size:34>{"Where does the light go
when it is dark?"}

name: Immortal Resolve
flavourText: The threads of fate are the strongest ties.

name: Imperfect Memories
flavourText: Everything is eroded by time, but sometimes the edges that fade can make a wonderful memory even more beautiful.

name: Imperial Legacy
flavourText: A life lost, A legacy born.

name: Jack in the Box
flavourText:
Turn the crank, 
close your eyes, 
and pray to the gods 
for a pleasant surprise.

name: Judging Voices
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText: He was seeking sanity, but the demons were inside his head.

name: Justified Ambition
flavourText:
"Everything I have done has been for Wraeclast. You would pledge your life to me if you saw things my way... and soon, you will."
- High Templar Venarius

name: Keeper's Corruption
flavourText:
With great power comes...

...Even greater power.

name: Lachrymal Necrosis

explicitModifiers.text:
<rareitem>{Jewel}
<enchanted>{Implicit Modifier:} 
<magicitem>{Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you}
<corrupted>{Corrupted}

flavourText: Without the ability to weep, the heart hardens against both the pure and the corrupt.

name: Lantador's Lost Love
flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

name: Last Hope
flavourText: <size:31>{As their civilisation crumbled, the Vaal looked to their queen. In her, they saw a way out. In them, she saw a burden she was happy to free herself from.}

name: Last Stand
flavourText:
Return with your shield...
or on it.

name: Left to Fate
flavourText:
<size:30>{Many strive for greatness,
but it is challenge, unforeseen,
that forges heroes.}

name: Lethean Temptation
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText: My memories tortured me without end. To escape them, I embraced nothingness, but oblivion simply brought a different kind of pain...

name: Light and Truth
flavourText:
Time and change
shall naught avail,
To dim the Light
of Truth's fair grail.

name: Lingering Remnants
flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

name: Lonely Warrior
flavourText:
A true warrior fights
for those who cannot
fight for themselves.

name: Lost Worlds
additionalDropRestrictions: Sold by Kirac for 1x Orb of ChanceOrb of ChanceStack Size: 20Upgrades a normal item to a random rarityRight click this item then left click a normal item to apply it..
flavourText:
<size:27>{"There are worlds that lie beyond the edge of my page, the edge of my understanding. Worlds of wonder. Worlds of terror."
Aramil - Cartographer to Emperor Chitus}

name: Love Through Ice
flavourText:
"I know one lady for whose sake I will rip out my heart"

- Derrok, the Dreamer

name: Loyalty
flavourText:
Bound by fate,
inseparable by choice.

name: Lucky Connections
flavourText: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

name: Lucky Deck
flavourText: When the outcome is the same, does it matter if it is fortune or trickery?

name: Luminous Trove
flavourText:
<size:24>{Plenty enter, dreaming of treasure
Twenty bled, slain as they fled
Shadows loom, half left doomed
The blind cries, five lost eyes
Careless twins, a lich's new prize
One as a decoy, none pass the king
Gehennix feeds only on whispers}

name: Lysah's Respite
flavourText:
So many memories,
so much pain in
such a small token.
Drown it in blood
so you can forget.

name: Magnum Opus
flavourText: Wraeclast will unite. This shall be my great work - the minds of the people made one.

name: Man With Bear
flavourText: A stereotypical joke may lead to an unexpected bond.

name: Matryoshka

explicitModifiers.text:
<rareitem> {Onyx Amulet}
<size:25>{<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{85}
<default>{Quality:} <augmented>{+20%}
<default>{Influenced Item}
<enchanted>{Four Anointments}
<enchanted>{Incubating Talisman Item}
<corrupted>{Corrupted}}

flavourText:
<size:28>{I cannot contain myself,
but I can barely squeak,
so many words I'd have for you,
if I could only speak!}

name: Mawr Blaidd
flavourText: Rigwald believed he'd seized great power, but it was the great power that had seized Rigwald

name: Might is Right
flavourText: The mind had much to endure before the advent of thaumaturgy.

name: Misery in Darkness
flavourText:
<size:30>{He wandered the bone-filled depths hoping each corner would be his last.
Eventually, he found Light.}

name: Mitts
flavourText: Those whose hands are their livelihood know the importance of keeping them safe and warm.

name: Monochrome
flavourText:
<size:28>{"You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection." 
- Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist}

name: More is Never Enough
flavourText: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it

name: No Traces
flavourText: <size:31>{There is no mistake so great that it cannot be undone.}

name: Nook's Crown
flavourText:
<size:28>{Every skull was once a person. 
Though 'Who?' is rarely asked. 
Friends, who wear 
the crown of Nook, 
Never need to ask. 
They remember.}

name: One Last Score
flavourText:
<size:30>{You want to know how
I haven't been caught? 
It's not just speed.
You need some luck.}

name: Outfoxed
flavourText:
The prize vanished. 
No trail, no struggle.
Just a single, rust-red hair.

name: Parasitic Passengers
flavourText: Feeding on death, they grew stronger and stronger, until they were ready to hatch...

name: Peaceful Moments
flavourText: Savour these moments, for they may never return.

name: Perfection
flavourText: There are countless worlds, but only those with limitless potential will be able to achieve perfection.

name: Poisoned Faith
flavourText: Even our most devout beliefs are subtly shaped by our darkest desires.

name: Prejudice
additionalDropRestrictions: This card drops in Redeemer-influenced maps. Other sources of divination card, such as Legion encounter with divination card reward type, can bypass this restriction.
flavourText: One who is blinded by their past may only see a sliver of the present.

name: Pride Before the Fall
flavourText:
<size:27>{As Kaom slew the last of his kin,
something deep inside him broke.
And through the cracks, corruption,
pure and black, spread forth.}

name: Pride of the First Ones
flavourText:
"through thick and thin,
blood and bone,
a peaceful life
is one I can't condone."
- Tukohama, Father Of War

name: Prometheus' Armoury
flavourText: It is a mortal man's folly to seek power beyond his comprehension.

name: Prosperity
flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

name: Rain of Chaos
flavourText:
<size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night 
Chaos reigned 
Where the shards fell 
All was destroyed 
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}

name: Rain Tempter
flavourText: Be like water, friend.

name: Rats
flavourText: Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.

name: Rebirth
flavourText:
He shattered Her smile,
 Scattered the fragments like ash,
 All she did was laugh

name: Rebirth and Renewal
flavourText: Life has an end, then life begins again.

name: Reckless Ambition
flavourText: Why settle when more is never enough.

name: Remembrance
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from "Light Jewellery" chests in the underground sections of Primeval Ruins, Abyssal City, and Vaal Outpost Delve nodes.
flavourText:
<size:28>{"For all your struggles, all your achievements, even for the greatest of us, a story is all that remains. Write it well." 

-Julius Perandus, Father of Chitus}

name: Runic Luck
flavourText:
If you believe hard enough,
you'll win.

name: Sambodhi's Vow
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from members of the Immortal Syndicate.
flavourText:
<size:34>{He dispels dark realms
until mortal sufferings
yield to hopeful light.}

name: Sambodhi's Wisdom
flavourText:
<size:28>{No blade conquers sin;
guide a sinner to virtue,
unveil their lost sight—
your eyes, too, see in
everyone the inner child,
no matter their might.}

name: Scholar of the Seas
flavourText: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

name: Seven Years Bad Luck
flavourText: If enough people believe something to be true, whether or not it is becomes irrelevant.

name: Shard of Fate
flavourText:
Their whims left unknown,
Their life left for others.

name: Silence and Frost
flavourText:
Cry havoc!
Unleash pandemonium!

name: Society's Remorse
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Voltaxic Sulphite deposits
flavourText:
<size:28>{We live to dream of worlds we aren't in,
a false narrative that we use to fill our souls
with doubt;
The world is already beautiful,
there's no need to dream.}

name: Something Dark
flavourText: Even in darkness you may find a friend.

name: Squandered Prosperity
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText: "Our rulers are being ridiculous, and we are suffering."

name: Struck by Lightning
flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

name: Succor of the Sinless
flavourText: Blessed is the blood of the beholden disciple. The earth is anointed by his step. The damnable are sanctified by his strike.

name: Temperance
flavourText:
Good things come
to those who wait;
but, greatness seeks
those who do not come.

name: Terrible Secret of Space
flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

name: The Academic
flavourText:
<size:26>{"Such dedication for so many years,
all for a couple extra letters at the front of your name..."}

name: The Admirer
flavourText: Lucian lost himself in ancient scrolls and found in those scrolls a love whose power bridged a millennium.

name: The Adventuring Spirit
flavourText: Dost thou lead my men to victory, my child?

name: The Aesthete
flavourText:
"Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."
- Shavronne of Umbra

name: The Apothecary
flavourText: "You seek the power of my strongest potions, but the price will be far higher than you can imagine."

name: The Archmage's Right Hand
flavourText: "When grasped in his hand, even an ordinary piece of wood can make the heavens tremble with fear."

name: The Arena Champion
flavourText: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

name: The Army of Blood
flavourText:
<size:28>{I gave my mind without a fight, 
The twelfth hour I lost control. 
The day is gone but there is light, 
eyes that glow like red-hot coal.}

name: The Artist
flavourText: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

name: The Aspirant
flavourText:
<size:26>{Those Exiles that survive Wraeclast
dream not of home, but of power.}

name: The Astromancer
flavourText:
<size:24>{They would say that he was a dangerous man,
unbound by the sense of morality,
but what does this matter,
when his love for humanity is undeniable
and completion of his work would benefit everyone?}

name: The Avenger
flavourText:
Justice comes swift 
Equal to the crime 
Revenge is a gift 
Life for a life 
Eye for an eye

name: The Awakened
flavourText: Some seek to change the world. Others change the world as a consequence of what they seek.

name: The Bargain
flavourText:
In the pursuit of power, as in that of wealth,
anything goes.

name: The Battle Born
flavourText: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

name: The Bear Woman
flavourText:
<size:24>{For the blessed bear in the cave,
A hundred days pass in silence and darkness,
until moon begins its fourth passage,
the bear sheds her beastly fur,
and is reborn, human and whole.}

name: The Beast
dropAreas: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
The Belly of the Beast Level 2
flavourText: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

name: The Betrayal
flavourText: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

name: The Bitter Blossom
flavourText: The pain you feel is of no consequence, it is evolution, to be made whole within something greater.

name: The Blazing Fire
flavourText: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

name: The Blessing of Moosh
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop after interacting with darkshrines inside the Lord's Labyrinth (Merciless, Eternal, or Enriched).
flavourText: While the Labyrinth traps have claimed countless adventurers, they were not designed with felines in mind.

name: The Body
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from an Armourer's Strongbox.
flavourText: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

name: The Bones
flavourText: The flesh is a prison, and we are finally free.

name: The Brawny Battle Mage
flavourText: A humble piece of wood offers the simplest solution to life's problems: just hit them really, really hard.

name: The Breach
flavourText: Ever get the feeling you're being watched...?

name: The Brittle Emperor
flavourText:
<size:31>{"When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass."
- Victario, the People's Poet}

name: The Cache
flavourText:
<size:23>{Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny
Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny
Secured within a chest 
or unearthed from your mining
Find jewellery everywhere, 
no need for divining!
So why is it so hard 
to figure out which one to wear?
This one makes me stronger, 
but does it match my hair?}

name: The Cacophony
flavourText: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

name: The Calling
flavourText: <size:32>{Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.}

name: The Card Sharp
flavourText: "The house always wins... except when I do."

name: The Carrion Crow
flavourText:
From death, life. 
From life, death. 
The wheel turns, 
and the corbies wheel overhead.

name: The Cartographer
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from Cartographer's Strongboxes.
flavourText:
<size:31>{My son, you lost your way before you arrived.
To never lose you again,
I make a path in my heart.}

name: The Cataclysm
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops in Vaal side areas. Has a minimum drop level restriction of 72.
flavourText: <size:27>{The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.}

name: The Catalyst
flavourText: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

name: The Catch
flavourText: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

name: The Celestial Justicar
flavourText: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

name: The Celestial Stone
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Jeweller's Strongboxes.
flavourText: Stare into its depths too long, and you may lose yourself entirely.

name: The Chains that Bind
flavourText: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

name: The Cheater
flavourText: Sometimes the best way to achieve greatness is to use a shortcut.

name: The Chosen
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Breach encounters such as in a Clasped Hand. In Keepers league, can drop from Hiveborn monsters in Breach encounters (i.e. Breach Hive, Unstable Breach, Hive Fortress).
flavourText: They whose lives were given to clothe the Dark Dreamer... They were the lucky ones.

name: The Coming Storm
flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

name: The Conduit
flavourText: The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.

name: The Craving
flavourText: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

name: The Cursed King
flavourText:
The First Ones
may be blasphemy,
but they are
powerful blasphemy.

name: The Damned
flavourText:
<size:28>{Souls along a conduit of blood, 
from one vessel to the next.}

name: The Dapper Prodigy
flavourText: "Many believe murder is a grisly, grim, and grotesque crime. Then there are those who simply make art of it."

name: The Dark Mage
flavourText:
With staff in hand
and wrath in heart,
your soul and corpse
shall surely part.

name: The Darkest Dream
flavourText: A dream from which you cannot awake is nothing other than a nightmare.

name: The Deal
flavourText: In the pursuit of wealth, as in that of power, anything goes.

name: The Deceiver
flavourText: Beware the combatant who shows no confidence, yet still enters the ring, for they are surely hiding something.

name: The Deep Ones
flavourText: <size:28>{"The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"}

name: The Demon
flavourText: A man who hears voices may not necessarily be crazy.

name: The Demoness
flavourText: Wherever she went, death was sure to follow.

name: The Destination
flavourText: You may be nothing to everybody, but you are everything to somebody.

name: The Doctor
flavourText: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

name: The Doppelganger
flavourText: Upon seeing her face, I am terrified—the moon shows me my own form!

name: The Dragon
flavourText:
<size:28>{Scaly beast of the skies,
watching with his golden eyes.
Shadow that blocks out the sun,
it's too late for you to run.}

name: The Dragon's Heart
flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

name: The Dreamer
flavourText:
A dark note drips
from the dreamer's Lips,
A honeyed melody.
We stand, we fall
on his beck and call,
forin his dream we're free.

name: The Dreamland
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from Cartographer's Strongboxes.
flavourText: All dreams vanish when the dreamers wake.

name: The Drunken Aristocrat
flavourText: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

name: The Dungeon Master
flavourText: "So desperate was I for control, I turned my entire world into a prison. Now you will share in my agony."

name: The Easy Stroll
flavourText:
"I'm going for a walk. I'll be back soon."

 - Blonca's last words

name: The Eldritch Decay
flavourText: Time dismantles all things eventually, but some wish to accelerate the process.

name: The Emptiness
additionalDropRestrictions: Drop disabled in Keepers league.
flavourText: He appeared before the Light Eater, and at once knew his soul was damned.

name: The Encroaching Darkness
flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

name: The Endless Darkness
flavourText: Gaze towards the stars, but beware what gazes back.

name: The Endurance
flavourText:
<size:28>{Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,
flowing through my veins,
flesh like coal, try to crush me,
diamond is what remains.}

name: The Enforcer

explicitModifiers.text:
<magicitem>{Spiked Gloves of the Conquest (Culling Strike)}
<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{86}
<default>{Warlord Item}

flavourText:
<size:28>{"Boss said to get rid of him, didn't say not to make a mess."
- Rune The Goon}

name: The Enlightened
flavourText:
Weaving the six,
a serpent stands tall.
Wearing a crown,
the thousand petals call.

name: The Enthusiasts
flavourText:
<size:25>{"Glimmers of benevolence,
Shrouded a lacquered lust for power,
Yet still they followed his influence."}

name: The Escape
flavourText: In fleeing reality, you step into the realm of madness.

name: The Eternal War
flavourText: They believed, falsely, that the strongest of generals could outlast eons of corruption.

name: The Ethereal
flavourText:
<size:30>{"Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge}

name: The Explorer
flavourText: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

name: The Eye of Terror
flavourText: The Lord of Chaos dreams as his Eye gazes, unblinking, at his prize. And soon, all shall tremble before his waking form.

name: The Eye of the Dragon
flavourText:
Some powers are far too great even for the
gods of old.

name: The Fathomless Depths
flavourText: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

name: The Feast
flavourText: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

name: The Fiend
flavourText:
<size:31>{Your era is now,
your power unwavered, 
soon we will see
who the gods truly favoured.}

name: The Finishing Touch
flavourText: <size:29>{A little extra flair never hurts.}

name: The Fishmonger
flavourText: However vicious Rhoas might be, a dedicated angler may in time tame them.

name: The Fletcher
flavourText: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

name: The Flora's Gift
flavourText:
Sturdy and strong,
grown from the stream.
The Flora that live here,
A combatant's dream.

name: The Fool
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from members of the Immortal Syndicate.
flavourText: Even the most learned man is a fool to his own fate.

name: The Forgotten Treasure
flavourText: <size:28>{Don't let fool's gold deceive you.}

name: The Formless Sea
flavourText:
Formless might,
Wild beauty tamed,
The brine of gods,
The seas restrained.

name: The Forsaken
flavourText: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

name: The Fortunate
flavourText:
<size:26>{The fortunate find 
generosity in the divine.}

name: The Forward Gaze
flavourText: "When they realize our true intent, they will decry us, assault us, and try to crush what we have built. We must stand tall, Qotra, and make the future our own."

name: The Fox
flavourText:
"Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb

name: The Fox in the Brambles
flavourText: <size:26>{Hemmingsworth 6:10 - "And the fox gazed out from the brambles, unreachable and smirking."}

name: The Gambler
flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

name: The Garish Power
flavourText: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

name: The Gemcutter
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Gemcutter's Strongboxes.
flavourText: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

name: The Gentleman
flavourText: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

name: The Gladiator
flavourText:
The thumb turns down
and the crowd roars, 
they want death 
and the blood is yours.

name: The Golden Era
flavourText: Before gemlings, before thaumaturgy, a simple court magician could enthrall the masses.

name: The Greatest Intentions
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops in Maven's Invitation: The FearedMaven's Invitation: The FearedModifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards droppedThe Maven must Witness:Cortex,Eye of the Storm,Moment of Reverence,The Shaper's Realm,Absence of Value and MeaningFor those who must not endure it,there may be found a perverse joy in watching the struggle for survival.Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device..
flavourText: Chasing purity in the rising light means facing the darkening edges of the spirit.

name: The Gulf
flavourText:
I thought love stronger than all,
but time and isolation broke
that which madness could not

name: The Hale Heart
flavourText: Though the years weakened his mind, his body remained deadly as Ever.

name: The Harvester
flavourText:
<size:30>{Taste not of their
forbidden fruit.
Theirs is a harvest of
the darkest kind,
twisted, rotten and
damned for eternity.}

name: The Hermit
flavourText: The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.

name: The Heroic Shot
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Arcanist's Strongboxes.
flavourText: Try a thousand times, and eventually you'll have to give up.

name: The Hive of Knowledge
flavourText: Within years of knowledge, distilled by careful craftsmanship, lies great power.

name: The Hoarder
flavourText: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

name: The Hook
flavourText: Every obsession began with a single, innocent taste.

name: The Hunger
flavourText:
"How many lives have you consumed?" 
"How many times have you blinked?"

name: The Immortal
flavourText:
<size:30>{"Greetings! Just because you think I'm greedy doesn't mean I'm not willing to share. You'll just have to kill me first."
-Grandmaster Dy'Ness}

name: The Incantation
flavourText: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

name: The Innocent
flavourText: His brother would not atone, so he took his brother's life, and with it, his sins.

name: The Inoculated
flavourText: Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.

name: The Insane Cat
flavourText: One person's madness is another person's reality.

name: The Insatiable
flavourText: A lust for souls. The urge to kill just to satisfy its thirst. An unbearable burden that would make even the purest heart blacken over time.

name: The Inventor
flavourText:
Jump right in, 
But beware 
Of things broken 
Or beyond compare.

name: The Jester
flavourText:
<size:25>{Summoned for the King's desire,
soon applause came from the court.
However insanity was his only sire,
so the King's reign was cut short.}

name: The Jeweller's Boon
flavourText: The jeweller's true talent is the capacity to see a jewel's beauty before they draw it out.

name: The Journalist
flavourText: A good spy doesn't forget she's gone undercover.

name: The Journey
flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

name: The King's Blade
flavourText:
<size:25>{"To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."
- Daresso, the King of Swords}

name: The King's Heart
flavourText: <size:31>{500 times Kaom's axe fell, 500 times Kaom's Heart splintered. Finally, all that remained was a terrible, heartless Fury.}

name: The Lake
flavourText:
Gaze upon the Lake
Gaze upon your Reflection
Your full Potential

name: The Landing
flavourText: Warriors of a distant land, you embark on a journey from which you may not return, but which we will be all the better for.

name: The Last Laugh
flavourText:
<size:24>{Holding fast when shadows fall,
Over ruins, jesters call.
Nothing breaks their twisted cheer,
Kings of chaos, friends sincere.}

name: The Last One Standing
flavourText: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

name: The Last Supper
flavourText: "Bino's brief career as a chef at Axiom saved the executioner a lot of work."

name: The Leviathan
flavourText:
<size:28>{Ancient behemoths swam the
depths of the oceans long
before Man walked these lands.}

name: The Lich
flavourText: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

name: The Life Thief
flavourText:
"The process of eternal youth is a give and take. You give them death and take their youth."
- Zerphi of the Vaal

name: The Lion
flavourText: <size:31>{The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.}

name: The Long Con
additionalDropRestrictions: This card drops from Izaro's Treasure chests in the Eternal Labyrinth (Uber Lab) and Enriched Eternal Labyrinth.
flavourText:
"This was the proudest moment of my life."

"... so far"

name: The Long Watch
flavourText: <size:26>{The rain pelts down, Mud grasping at his feet, as thoughts of those in his care bolster his resolve.}

name: The Lord in Black
flavourText:
<size:27>{Thy knee shall bend
in shifting dark,
thy blade shall serve his vigil.
Thy oath shall bind thee
to his mark,
thy flesh shall bear his sigil.}

name: The Lord of Celebration
flavourText: Though they were a pack of elite combatants, the Emperor's royal guards were not ready to face one of his notorious parties.

name: The Lover
flavourText: <size:26>{"I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."}

name: The Lunaris Priestess
flavourText:
Embrace the Light,
Await the Morrow,
No more Spite,
And no more Sorrow.

name: The Mad King
flavourText: Fear the man who lusts for power, for he will do anything to get it.

name: The Magma Crab
flavourText: Drink deeply of living rock and be as stone, with blood afire.

name: The Master Artisan
additionalDropRestrictions: Can drop from Artisan's Strongboxes.
flavourText: Perfection is the standard, excellence will be handled on a case by case basis.

name: The Mayor
flavourText:
A ruler is only as powerful as he is wealthy. 
Control the coin, control the empire.

name: The Mercenary
flavourText: Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

name: The Messenger
flavourText:
<<hbgi04>><<HBG04>><<HBGAt>><<HBG03>><<HBGAs>><<HBG01>><<HBGAy>><<HBG01>><<HBGBa>>
<<hbgi04>><<HBG02>><<HBGAk>><<HBG03>><<HBGBd>>
<<hbgi04>><<HBG02>><<HBGAm>><<HBG01>><<HBGAa>>
<<HBGBc>><<HBG03>><<HBGAy>><<hbgi00>><<HBGBe>><<HBG03>><<HBGAd>>

name: The Metalsmith's Gift
flavourText: <size:31>{A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.}

name: The Mind's Eyes
flavourText:
<size:28>{Through the eyes of a person, 
you can see their soul
Through the eyes of a jewel, 
you can see the universe}

name: The Mountain
flavourText:
<size:28>{Charmed by beautiful stones 
Consumed with the 
pursuit of perfection 
Ever deeper into the waiting dark}

name: The Nurse
flavourText: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

name: The Oath
flavourText: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

name: The Obscured
flavourText: Our world, dangerous as it is, is far safer than what lies just beyond our sight.

name: The Offering
flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

name: The Offspring
flavourText: The swarm began with just a couple of children. Now, it is her entire existence.

name: The Old Man
flavourText: Hear me, fish! I love and respect you, but before this day ends I will kill you dead.

name: The One That Got Away
flavourText:
Savor Life's missing pieces.
To complete one's final goal
is to take one's last breath.

name: The One With All
flavourText:
<size:26>{Embrace death to honour the lost,
no fear in life no matter the cost. 
With one of all we are, 
and all of one we trust, 
throughout past, present and future... be just.}

name: The Opulent
flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

name: The Pack Leader
flavourText: Become the leader you were born to be.

name: The Pact
flavourText: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

name: The Patient
flavourText: I have a headache, can anyone find me a nurse?

name: The Penitent
flavourText: <size:28>{First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.}

name: The Poet
flavourText:
<size:27>{God had forsaken the land 
And Victario wept.
Corruption consumed the land 
And Victario's tears turned to blood.}

name: The Polymath
flavourText: Genius knows no limits.

name: The Porcupine
flavourText: The first quill separates the quick learners from the dead.

name: The Price of Devotion
flavourText: <size:30>{Unbeknown to Atziri's finest thaumaturgists, their loyalty would require far greater devotion than mere research.}

name: The Price of Loyalty
flavourText: "Forge me a carapace from their skin, imbuaed with their soul. Then feed their flesh to the hounds."

name: The Price of Prescience
flavourText: <size:26>{The strange voice showed Aul a future where his legacy was forgotten, where new cultures broke themselves upon Aul's ruined world.}

name: The Price of Protection
flavourText:
To protect her mansion, she would cut a deal with anyone. Anything. 

Something answered.

name: The Primordial
flavourText:
We play at God with our necromancy, 
but forces far more potent 
sleep within these stones.

name: The Prince of Darkness
flavourText: <size:30>{Fear a man who is willing to sacrifice anything for power.}

name: The Professor
flavourText: The academic route to knowledge is wide and well-trodden; but it is the untaught one who scales the mountain.

name: The Progeny of Lunaris
flavourText:
Born beneath silver light, bearing Lunaris' mark.
Conjuring all his might, the Prodigy turned light to dark.

name: The Puzzle
flavourText: As countless fractures weaken the divide, nightmares seep through from the other side.

name: The Queen
flavourText:
The power of the world, 
lies upon your hands.

name: The Rabbit's Foot
flavourText: It is said anyone who bears this trinket is the luckiest exile in all of Wraeclast. The gods would disagree, and forever curse any whom give it away.

name: The Rabid Rhoa
flavourText:
"Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."
- Maligaro

name: The Realm
flavourText: If you wish to rush into strange places, be prepared to face strange things.

name: The Return of the Rat
flavourText: And he shall be heralded by the screams of the damned.

name: The Risk
additionalDropRestrictions: The Risk can drop from the following loot containers:* Diviner's Strongbox* Izaro's Treasure in the Endgame Labyrinth
flavourText: "There is no right or wrong choice, no best or worst. There are only choices and their consequences."

name: The Rite of Elements
flavourText:
<size:29>{A mind as quick as lightning, 
fists as hard as stone, 
a heart that burns with fury, 
and eyes that chill to the bone.}

name: The Road to Power
flavourText: A beacon on the horizon; a guiding light, a call for help, or a warning to turn back.

name: The Rusted Bard
flavourText:
<size:19>{Fourfold the refrain, fortissimo cheer.
One hundred rent twain, naught left for a bier.
The song rattles on, though hollow a bit.
See the hope is gone, no prize shall ye get.}

name: The Ruthless Ceinture
flavourText:
In combat, a warrior must first be resourceful,
and second, decisive.

name: The Sacrifice
flavourText: For some, the price of power is never too great..

name: The Saint's Treasure
flavourText: <size:31>{Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.}

name: The Samurai's Eye
flavourText: At night, when the seas are calm, and the skies dark, he can see it. The formless fiend that took his eye, and fractured his mind.

name: The Scarred Meadow
flavourText: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

name: The Scavenger
flavourText: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

name: The Scholar
flavourText: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

name: The Scout
flavourText: The first to travel are often rewarded for their journey, but all the treasure in the world cannot bring back those that are lost.

name: The Seeker
flavourText: All that is flawed is worthless. The slightest error, and this might as well be trash.

name: The Sephirot
flavourText: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

name: The Shepherd's Sandals
flavourText: <size:30>{He who watches the flock is himself watched by those with loyalty beyond measure.}

name: The Shieldbearer
flavourText: While you grow, I shall be your knight, and you my squire. One day, you shall be the one who stands and defends our home.

name: The Shortcut
flavourText: If time is the most valuable currency, how do you make more of it?

name: The Side Quest
flavourText: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

name: The Sigil
flavourText:
<size:29>{Three men travel
through the gate;
they carry a protective ward.
A faction conspires
against their fate,
but magic unravels the sword.}

name: The Siren
flavourText:
<size:26>{At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.}

name: The Skeleton
flavourText: They stand among us, and within us.

name: The Soul
flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

name: The Spark and the Flame
flavourText: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

name: The Spoiled Prince
flavourText: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

name: The Standoff
flavourText: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

name: The Stormcaller
flavourText:
If you beckon the
Lord of Lightning,
do not be surprised
when you are struck.

name: The Strategist
flavourText: Know thine enemy better than you know thyself.

name: The Summoner
flavourText: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

name: The Sun
flavourText: <size:31>{Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.}

name: The Surgeon
flavourText:
"He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."
- Malachai, on Maligaro

name: The Surveyor
flavourText: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

name: The Survivalist
flavourText:
A lucky number 
For us all 
To help us through 
The perils told.

name: The Sword King's Salute
flavourText:
<size:26>{Many were slain by the sword king 
Their blood decorating his ring 
Those who retreated were slaughtered 
Those who fought bravely were honoured}

name: The Thaumaturgist
flavourText:
<size:31>{"Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices."
- Shavronne of Umbra}

name: The Throne
flavourText: A king's movement is unwavering.

name: The Tinkerer's Table
flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

name: The Tireless Extractor
flavourText:
<size:30>{"I am not alone in this. I have God by my side! And... you help sometimes, I suppose."
- Sister Cassia}

name: The Tower
flavourText: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

name: The Traitor
flavourText:
<size:31>{Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.
Sometimes it happens by force.}

name: The Transformation
flavourText: Even the most beautiful of transformations can still have a dark side.

name: The Trial
flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

name: The Tumbleweed
flavourText: Love is the only redemption after succumbing to the grasps of the wasteland.

name: The Twilight Moon
flavourText: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

name: The Twins
The Tyrant
flavourText:
"Fear controls the masses."
- Laszlo, the Scourge

name: The Undaunted
flavourText:
<size:29>{"Fate was always my nemesis... 
But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now."
- Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted}

name: The Undisputed
flavourText: To create something truly spectacular, you must total failure.

name: The Unexpected Prize
flavourText:
<size:26>{They came from far and wide under a common banner.
They sought companionship and competition,
but found a treasure none had foreseen.}

name: The Union
flavourText:
On the 21st of Eterni, 
two become one, 
their light outshines 
the setting sun.

name: The Valkyrie
flavourText:
<size:26>{The villain strikes,
the world is torn.
A war begins, a hero is born,
The nemesis sets the sky alight.
A hero's sacrifice
sets everything right.
- Drake's Epitaph}

name: The Vast
flavourText:
<size:30>{Can you hear the siren's calls,
Just beyond the sea?
A voice which hearts
of men enthralls,
I too am hooked to thee.}

name: The Visionary
flavourText: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

name: The Void
flavourText: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

name: The Warden
flavourText: <size:31>{Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.}

name: The Warlord
flavourText:
To cure the Goddess,
and break the chains of corruption,
you must shatter the world.

name: The Watcher
flavourText:
<size:31>{Strange eyes on top of spines 
Gaze beyond the veil of time 
Deep down below the mines 
A dream of crimson and of grime}

name: The Web
flavourText:
<size:30>{A weapon, a shelter, a prison.
The web's purpose changes
with the spider's needs.
A lesson we should
take to heart.}

name: The Wedding Gift
flavourText: The acolytes congratulated the lucky groom for becoming one with the goddess.

name: The White Knight
flavourText: Where Decay festers, I shall expunge it, and leave in its place a shining monument.

name: The Whiteout
flavourText:
<size:25>{They thought winter had come early,
that snow blanketed the land,
but in truth, all their chickens
had come home to roost.}

name: The Wilted Rose
flavourText: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

name: The Wind
flavourText: <size:33>{Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.}

name: The Witch
flavourText:
<size:27>{A wanderer in the wild strives 
Against countless foes he survives 
A fool pursues a quest contrived 
By the gift of the witch, alive.}

name: The Wolf
flavourText: <size:29>{The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.}

name: The Wolf's Legacy
additionalDropRestrictions: This card drops from Izaro's Treasure chests, Labyrinth Troves, or Silver Key caches in the Merciless, Eternal, or Enriched Eternal Labyrinth.
flavourText: The howls and cackling could not mask the sadness.

name: The Wolf's Shadow
flavourText: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

name: The Wolven King's Bite
flavourText: <size:31>{A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.}

name: The Wolverine
flavourText: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

name: The Wrath
flavourText: <size:31>{"Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned}

name: The Wretched
flavourText: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

name: Thirst for Knowledge
flavourText:
<size:28>{A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source. 
Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.}

name: Three Faces in the Dark
flavourText: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

name: Three Voices
flavourText: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

name: Thunderous Skies
flavourText: <size:30>{Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.}

name: Time-Lost Relic
flavourText: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

name: Toxic Tidings
flavourText:
A beast even Einhar
will not hunt.

name: Tranquillity
flavourText: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

name: Treasure Hunter
flavourText:
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words

name: Triskaidekaphobia
flavourText: The Mists of Madness prey on those who harbour the deepest of fears.

name: Turn the Other Cheek
flavourText:
"Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."
- Sekhema Asenath

name: Unchained
flavourText: Mold the world with your bare hands. Be careful, for what is your doing might become your undoing.

name: Underground Forest
flavourText: "In the forest again... But at least I have these."

name: Unrequited Love
flavourText:
<size:26>{The pale flame of his heart disappeared in his azure reflection.
The work of a life.
Ambitious, and unfinished.}

name: Vanity
additionalDropRestrictions: Drops from Vaal Vessels in Vaal side areas.
flavourText:
They fought the storm together as one,
Until the longest of days was done.
Their love grew stronger
with every breath,
Until it was broken apart in death.

name: Vile Power
flavourText:
<size:24>{Dread and danger 
makes the air feel thin. 
Above, power slumbers, tempting fate. 
Greed and ambition 
draws countless in, 
For those who seek power 
can never wait.}

name: Vinia's Token
flavourText: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

name: Void of the Elements
flavourText: Though the forces of nature are mighty and intimidating, it is their absence which should be feared.

name: Volatile Power
flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

name: Wealth and Power
flavourText: <size:31>{The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.}

name: When Currents Blaze
flavourText:
In their fiery union,
the storm left the rivers
forever changed.

name: Who Asked
flavourText:
In the midst
of unrelenting requests,
The blacksmith's Forge
conjures the unpredictable
countless voices, countless desires -
yielding weapons as diverse
as those who ask

name: Winter's Embrace
additionalDropRestrictions: Unknown drop location
flavourText:
<size:29>{Come home to me, my sweet.
Oh, how long you've been!
Lie with me in the frozen dark.
I may yet find forgiveness
Now that fear has left you.}
